titles.ar: كتاب الزِّيِّ وَ التَّجَمُّلِ وَ الْمُرُوءَةِ
titles.en: The Book of Outfits and the Beautification and the Magnanimity
Chapter 11 – Wearing the silk and the brocade

titles.ar: كتاب الزِّيِّ وَ التَّجَمُّلِ وَ الْمُرُوءَةِ
titles.en: The Book of Outfits and the Beautification and the Magnanimity

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف على المشهور - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (2/332)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ وَ سَهْلِ بْنِ زِيَادٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ يَاسِرٍ قَالَ

text: قَالَ لِي أَبُو الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) اشْتَرِ لِنَفْسِكَ خَزّاً وَ إِنْ شِئْتَ فَوَشْياً فَقُلْتُ كُلَّ الْوَشْيِ فَقَالَ وَ مَا الْوَشْيُ قُلْتُ مَا لَمْ يَكُنْ فِيهِ قُطْنٌ يَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُ حَرَامٌ قَالَ الْبَسْ مَا فِيهِ قُطْنٌ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from Ibn Fazzal, and Sahl Bin Ziyad, form Muhammad Bin Isa, from Yasser who said,

‘Abu Al-Hassanasws said to me: ‘Buy Khazz for yourself, and if you so desire to, so Washy’. So I said, ‘They are all Al-Washy’. So heasws said: ‘And what is Al-Washy?’ I said, ‘What does not happen to have cotton in it. They (people) are saying, it is Prohibited’. Heasws said: ‘Wear what has cotton in it’.
en.sarwar: 1. A number of our people have narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ‘Isa from ibn Faddal and Sahl ibn Ziyad from Muhammad ibn ‘Isa from Yasir who has said the following: “Abu al-Hassan, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, once said to me, ‘Buy al-Khazz (garments made of skin or fur of an animal that lives in water) for yourself or if you like buy al-Washy.’ I then asked, ‘All with al- Washy?’ He (the Imam) asked, ‘ What is al-Washy ?’ I replied, ‘It is that which has no cotton in it and they say it is unlawful.’ He (the Imam) said, ‘You can wear what has cotton in it.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (2/332)
text: عَنْهُ عَنْ يُونُسَ بْنِ يَعْقُوبَ عَنِ الْحُسَيْنِ بْنِ سَالِمٍ الْعِجْلِيِّ أَنَّهُ حُمِلَ إِلَيْهِ الْوَشْيُ .

en.hubeali: From him, form Yunus Bin Yaqoub, from Al Husayn Bin Salim Al Ijaly, that - he delivered Al-Washy to himasws’.
en.sarwar: 2. It is narrated from the narrator of the previous Hadith from Yunus ibn Ya‘qub from al-Husayn ibn Salim al-‘Ijliy:That he delivered al-Washy to him (the Imam), ‘Alayhi al-Salam.

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: كالموثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (2/332)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ يُونُسَ بْنِ يَعْقُوبَ قَالَ

text: حَدَّثَنِي مَنْ أَثِقُ بِهِ أَنَّهُ رَأَى عَلَى جِوَارِي أَبِي الْحَسَنِ مُوسَى بْنِ جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) الْوَشْيَ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Mahboub, from Yunus Bin Yaqoub who said,
‘It was narrated to me by the one is reliable with it that he saw Al-Washy upon a slave girl of Abu Al-Hassan Musaasws Bin Ja’farasws’.
en.sarwar: 3. A number of our people have narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from ibn Mahbub from Yunus ibn Ya‘qub who has said that narrated to me the one whom I trust that: he saw on the girls of abu al-Hassan al-Washy (al-Khazz, garments made of skin or fur of an animal that lives in water) .
